tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I began consulting Dr. Vidya Gayatri during a high-risk pregnancy, and I couldn't have asked for a better doctor. Dr. Vidya was incredibly patient, attentively listened to all my concerns, and provided her expert advice. She was always just a message away whenever I needed to reach out remotely, offering reassurance and calming my worries when I panicked. Thanks to her consistent care and treatment, I successfully delivered a healthy baby via cesarean section. I am immensely grateful for her professionalism and dedication throughout my pregnancy. Huge thanks to Dr. Vidya!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am happy with the doctor friendliness

I visited the doctor for my second pregnancy, complete treatment of 9 months the doctor was excellent, every time we visit doctor explains every thing clearly, even in this pandemic situation when there was strict lockdown going on we could not travel to the hospital for the check-ups through the video call she had cleared all my doubts and provided suggestions as needed. 
mainly for the thyroid and diabetics which I had got during my pregnancy, she explained about these things how they come during this time and how to control using diet and exercises 
As ours is planned C-section from my initial visits she every-time explains how the labor would be and what are the things to take care of before and after the surgery, also provided tips on lactation
every time I call her, without any hesitation she use to answer and clear all  doubts 
I am completely satisfied with the doctor, and strongly recommend 
Finally, I owe a big thank you to the doctor for giving me full support during these 9 months.
Both I and my baby are healthy happy and safe

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,Maternal Care/ Checkup,
review:
Happy to share that we are blessed with Baby boy this December and very grateful to Dr.Vidya Gayathri Mam for making this journey which is my first pregnancy very smooth and to go through with confidence.
We approached doctor with complaint of irregular mensrual cycle and informed her on baby planning.Following her advice ,performed very few tests and very few medications for vitamins, and  in very short time got conceived. And when diagonised with gestational diabetes ,followed her diet advice and could make it under control without any medication.
She always explains the problems or scan details or any health related  in detailed way and that we always feel relaxed after consultation so we know what to be followed.
And also always she is available for any query or emergency on her whatsapp or call.
 
Very understanding and motivating person and never forces to go on with her opinion alone rather she explains the thing and makes patients to understand the problem first.
I would highly recommend Dr vidya Gayathri for those who look for a gynaec for baby planning and any other gynaec related.

Thank you so much mam !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would recommend the doctor to anyone ,who wants a safe and relaxed pregnancy time throughout the entire cycle .We lost our first baby on  hydrocephalus condition and me and my wife was very much disheartened on the outcome in our hometown.We visited the doctor for our next pregnancy checkup  from the beginning and she was very caring and  motivated my wife throughout her entire pregnancy and clarified all our silly thoughts and blatant suggestions from our Google knowledge .She never missed to explain any of the minute details and backed us in all our ups and downs .No unnecessary tablets and no frequent checkups unless needed .She made the visits very fruitful and remembered the case history very well .She is one awesome doctor whom we will refer to any of our friends and she is highly recommended to anyone for a safe and happy pregnancy .We were blessed with an baby boy on 17th of November and Doctor Vidya Gayathri promised us for Normal delivery and finally here we are with our  baby boy .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would highly  recommend  her I had my c section  on 27th July by another gynaecologist  in Manipal  hospital. On 22nd Aug I had developed  a secondary  PPH and was admitted  in Manipal  hospital  where in the scan it showed RPOC retained  products  of conception  of size 3cm .My previous  gynaecologist  whoam  I consulted for my delivery  said that its a clot , she was confidently  telling  she had cleaned  my uretus  well ..so when I asked for a second  scan she didn't  write for it .As my bleeding  was not stopping  I thought  of going  for a second  opinion  and went to hershe  was very friendly  and heard my story As I had my c section  few weeks bad , she tried  her best through  medicine  to expel the Rpoc  but unfortunately  in the scan it was still there..so she advised  us to do D&C  with ultrasound  guidelines..It was risky  to touch a urteus which had done  c section  few weeks  back..but she gave  us confidence  to go head and she did my surgery .It went good .As my previous  gynecologist who did my delivery  just left me , I was totally  left with no options. But she actually  saved meI would recommend  highly  recommend  her
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: The medical field is often a slippery slope to tackle with some doctors who are trigger happy and quick to recommend surgery. Dr. Vidya is a beacon of comforting light amidst the chaos. I had a prepartem delivery in 36th week, I had been for a general checkup on 18th January. Everything was fine and recommended me to visit her next with the growth scan in 37th week. The same night at around 11:30 pm my water broke and I had to rush to the hospital as per Dr. Vidya's advice. My labour pain started and  had a normal delivery with 3rd degree tair. Dr Vidya Gayathri is sooo to the point and so perfect with her comments and crystal clear in her approach that it gives the patient a lot of confidence and belief. She does not expect regular visits , and calls u back only if needed. Doctor Vidya also recommended that I Whatsapp her the reports and don’t see her unless highly necessary thereby saving me the time, effort and money of an in person appointment. I would highly recommend Doctor Vidya.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited her at Aegis Medicare in Seegehalli based on the earlier practo ratings. I can't speak much about her treatment, bcoz we have hardly taken any treatment from her.  To start with consulation charges it is mentioned 400 in Practo and during visit they charged 500 100 total 600 including first time registration charges. Though it was our early days Pregnancy there were no minimum facilities like scanning etc in clinic, why they are charging registration charges God knows. *** *** *** **** ******* ******* ****** ***** ** ******* ************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: ****** ***** ******** ** ** ********* ******. She took personal care and explained everything during and after pregnancy very nicely and patiently. My pregnancy journey was very smooth with her and I could not have asked for a better experience. I had met a lot of doctors before deciding to go with Vidya ma'am, mainly because of her soft spoken attitude and calm demeanor. She even handled few complications in my pregnancy very well and ensured a safe delivery of my baby. Additionally she was very approachable and did not hesitate to answer any questions, however silly, I had. I highly recommend Dr Vidya Gayathri and would like to thank her for a wonderful experience.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting Vidya Gayathri doctor for my second pregnancy. Got to know her through a friend and consulted her in Cloud Nine hospital. My personal experience has been excellent with the doctor. She is friendly, down to earth and granted my wish for a Normal delivery even though my case was complicated with 2 loops around baby's neck. She has never missed to respond back to my queries over WhatsApp and always available. She is very encouraging and provided me confidence. Words can't express my gratitude towards her. Thank you !
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was visiting dr Vidya for my pregnancy from first month of pregnancy. She listens to the problem very carefully and explain the solution.
She also follow the traditional way and does not ask to do so many unnecessary  test and scans. throughout  the pregnancy she never recommended me any expensive medicine. Always sticks to basics. 
Very friendly and very approachable. Very prompt on whatsapp query as well.
She diagnoses any medical condition quickly and treatment that on time.
I had a normal delivery and all thanks to Dr. Vidya.. who took care of things wonderfully. Supported throughout my labour and was always available to take correct decisions at correct time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr Vidya Gayathri for my Pregnancy. This was my first pregnancy and I was very nervous. She was very friendly and she guided very well with detailed information with the issues and the process to overcome that. She was always reachable either over call , message or physical visit. I had minor complications with low lying placenta and growth of baby. She handled these complications very effectively. Even during my delivery day I was very nervous. But she was very supportive. Generally post C section days are bit painful for few days, but believe me, with Dr Vidya Gayathri it won't be that. She is very friendly. I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnancy Tests,Labor and Delivery,
review: Dr.Vidhya Gayathri Mam is my first doctor I have consulted.As this is my first pregnancy Mam guided in each and every step from 3 rd month till the delivery.I have completed 39 weeks and 2 days for the due.My baby was 3.3 kg and thought it will be bit difficult for normal delivery.so I was admitted to induce labour . Great thanks to Mam as she has waited whole day to get dialated and pains.Finally I delivered baby girl normally.I will never forget the support during the time.Thanks again for all the support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly *** ************* doctor. I visited her for my 1st pregnancy and delivery. My complete 9 months pregnancy experience with her was awesome. She was always reachable and prompt with her responses answering all my doubts and supporting me always with the best possible guidance for everything. She tried her best for normal delivery but we ended up with c section due to some complications at the end. She was so encouraging throughout the progression of my labour. She also guided me with post delivery care and lactation advices. Completely satisfied and would strongly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Tubectomy,
review:
I am very happy and highly recommend Dr Vidya Gayathri mam for pregnancy consultations. 
She is available whenever we need. She is always reachable for us over phone call in case of any emergency. During pregnancy, her physical examination always helped us to get confidence on baby's growth. I was advised to control the gestational diabetes through diet.  *** ***** ********** *********** *********** she is most humble and clear in giving explanations in detail. She is very patient to answer the repeated questions as well. Consulting with her always give positive vibes and helps making right decision on time. She ensured multiple times before we asked to go for Tubectomy as it is big decision.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
My delivery was on  3 rd March 2021.
For my second pregnancy I have consulted Dr. Vidya Gayathri. Because of this pandemic situation I was very scared to visit hospital and I have taken video consultations for my first 3 consultations.. Dr . Vidya  is very friendly and she was patiently replied all my concerns.. Before and after my C section she was very supportive and very caring .. she is still replying to all my questions and doubts that  I am asking through what’s app...I strongly recommend Dr. Vidya Gayathri to all....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got my baby delivered in cloudnine with the help of Dr.vidya Gayathri.I have consulted her from month 1 of my pregnancy.I would love to share my experience here since am overwhelmed with the doctor's behaviour and treatment.She tried so much for my normal delivery till the end.It was really great treated under her.she always explain health issues in detail with a smile on face which was really relaxing,encouraging and effective😊She remembers whatever health issues I faced during all 9months which was really impressive and always gave medicine after explaining it's impact n need. I would highly recommend her if you are planning for baby.*** ** ****** **** **** **** **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy,Pregnant,Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Firstly would like to thank Dr. Vidya, for making this complete pregnancy cycle and delivery very smooth. Had a miscarriage last year and we approached her with lot of questions. But she stayed calm and explained about pcod and gave us some suggestions and medicines, which in turn helped me to get conceive again. From day 1 , everything was taken care carefully. After 6th month, got pregnancy diabetes and bp fluctuations but she handled and it was taken care and watched very closely. Thank you so much Mam for the positive vibes and all your support which helped us in delivering our little healthy princess on 4th dec 2020.Would highly recommend to All.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
I consulted Dr Vidhya from my 5 th month of second pregnancy. Doctor was very patient and friendly. She patiently listened to all my queries and that made me stress free. I had an emergency c-section for my first delivery and it was a tough time 
due pain and recovery took long time. So I was very much afraid to opt for a second c-section but Dr Vidhya was the best choice I made. I felt really relaxed after consultations. Following her advises I had very smooth pregnancy and fast recovery this time.
I highly recommend Dr Vidhya for all those who look for a good Gynac and I am thankful to her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Family Planning,
review:
I had overall great experience with Dr Vidhya Gayatri. I was referring to another gynaecologist till 8th month, but was never comfortable. But meeting Dr Vidya Gayatri for a 2nd opinion really changed my perspective. I felt very positive about myself and overall pregnancy. I immediately switched to her and am glad to have taken the right decision at right time. 

She had lot of patience to hear me in detail, explain my complications and always gave me positive perspective about things. With her, my last one month of pregnancy and overall delivery was very smooth. Thank you so much Doctor for this joyful experience in otherwise a complicated pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,
review:
We consulted Dr. Vidya Gayatri for our second pregnancy. She understood my case history very well and guided me accordingly. During this covid time as well she was calm and composed on our every visit. The best thing is she listens to patients questions/ concerns very carefully and with full attention. Many a times she doesn’t have to look at the file for the case history as she remembers it very well . Also she was available for me on phone and whatsapp as well for any concerns or symptoms which might have occured due to change in medication or otherwise as well.
I still remember the way she made me at ease and said - ‘don’t worry. You are in safe hands now’ just before my delivery. 
I can recommend her without hesitation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Maternal Care/ Checkup,Maternal Fetal Medicine,
review:
From confirming the pregnancy(2nd month) till delivering the baby we only saw Dr. Vidhya Gayatri (except for one time, just to take second opinion) for all our consultations. She is a great doctor, she cares a lot about her patients and all the complications during pregnancy were handled with utmost care and after following  all her advices  we delivered a healthy baby through  normal vaginal birth.
Even though there were some complications but she took care of all of them, we never felt scared and worried throughout 8 months. 
We are very happy that she was our doctor and and highly appreciate all her help and support throughout the pregnancy.
We highly recommend her to other couples who are expecting

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Vidya was the best choice we could make when looking for a gynac at the beginning of my pregnancy. I was scared and needed a doctor who would be calm and sweet and explain me anything I had confusion with. Dr. Vidya was all that and more. The genuine smile with which she greets a patient is itself enough to settle jittery nerves. She was always patient with my queries (I always went with a list) and never made me feel silly. She has always been available on phone as well. She gave the confidence I needed throughout.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After IVF Conception from renowned Dr. Manju Nair, we were referred to a renowned doctor in Cloud9 Whitefield. Even though that doctor was renowned but personally I found her extremely busy, un-approachable, and emotionally insensitive because of which we decided to change the doctor. Based on feedback from one of our friends we switched to Dr. Vidya Gayathri. Dr. Vidya Gayathri was not only knowledgeable (e.g. she detected and treated a rare infection which was missed by previous doctor) but also very approachable, polite, patient, available on WhatsApp for instances where we need doctor's opinion (as this was our first pregnancy, their were numerous instances where an "Ok", "It's normal" brings down your anxiety). Towards 7th month of pregnancy my wife had "Obstetric Cholestasis"; to address this she clearly explained us the complications involved along-with monitoring the LFT levels closely. To my astonishment, she even remembered the critical numbers related to the treatment, reports. There has been instances where-in we had numerous queries, she addressed each with a medical reason which helped a lot to bring down the anxiety. Finally, we were blessed with a baby girl last month and I truly treasure and recommend her as a doctor and individual. Be rest assured that you are in safe hands!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I went for my pregnancy everything was normal no BP no diabetes. She was very encouraging and would answer all my doubts immediately in whatsapp. She doesn't give unwanted scan. She gives the low cost scan and the she gives us the freedom of choosing the scan center. She is very friendly and optimistic. 

She solved my many problems as below
Urinary Infection
Low amniotic fluid
Post surgery she used to answer all my queries without charging single penny in whatsapp which saved lot of money and time 

During covid situation she did not panic us. She took more care like mother and never suggested any unwanted test. She gave us full confidence throughout my pregnancy

In last checkup of my pregnancy she did membrane sweep two weeks before due date without asking my concern if she can proceed. Though it's a safe procedure which did not work for me

My water broke with no pain ended up in c section. May be she could have waited one more week for my labour pain. My kind request for her is to ask the patient if membrane sweep is ok or not as many patients aren't aware. Having said that iam no doctor to comment on. Each body is different.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Very happy to write my feelings.... She is very simple and gentle behaviour doctor and kind at heart.i have not yet met any other doctor like her.she gives maximum time to hear patients view.she always explain the problem and give best solution for that.
  Thanks for your support Ma'am.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: we have consulted Dr.vidya for our second pregnancy and have the smooth process.she is very patient doctor and advise medicines only if really required.she is always available on phone and doesn't call for consultation unnecessary.also clears each and every doubt of patient with utmost care.we will definitely refer the doctor to our friends as had a really nice experience.Thanks doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would recommend dr Vidya Gayathri to everyone who is looking to have a happy and healthy pregnancy. She was available throughout my pregnancy for all the doubts and clearified immediately. Because of her help I was able to have a normal delivery. Very happy with my doctor :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Vidya Gayathri is very friendly , supportive and a great doctor. She understands the patients situation, psychology and is very friendly. She is always reachable for any doubts, concerns any time. She assumes responsibility when it comes to patients and their treatments.
Would highly recommend her.

It was a pleasure getting my surgery done from her. I highly recommend to my family and friends who is planning baby to go treatment with Dr Vidhya Gaytri ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ Wanted to say thanks from bottom of the heart ♥️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
1. Patient friendly
2. Always approachable 
3. Great regard for our personal preferences 
4. Explains medical issues in layman's language 


Our experience with Dr. Vidya Gayatri was excellent. She was always available for all assistance over phone. She never prescribes unnecessary medicines and provides easy and simple solutions. Would definitely recommend her for pregnancy and gynec related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Vidya Gayatri is quite friendly and gives her time to the patients. I had a great experience with her throughout my nine months journey. She delivered my baby normally which is very rare now a days. She tries her best for normal delivery. Calm by personality, she listens to all your problems and provides the best treatment without panicking the patients. She always attended my calls be it midnights or early mornings. My child is now 6 months old and I can’t thank her enough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Vidhya is a real gem. She has patiently heard us and treated my wife very well. Her deep knowledge and her friendliness is amazing. My wife had some complications during the pregnancy which is very well handled by Doctor. We're blessed with a baby girl and feel so thankful to god and the doctor. Thank you so much, Dr Vidhya! :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,Pregnancy care and management,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I had consulted with her for planning my pregnancy after a miscarriage. She suggested the right tests and treatment, Guided me throughout my pregnancy and helped me deliver a healthy baby boy. She was always available for any queries and support wherever i contacted her. she did not suggest any unnecessary scans, tests or medications. Doctor is extremely friendly and approachable, and made me feel very comfortable throughout my pregnancy. Highly recommend her for pregnancy care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We started seeing Dr. Vidhya based on referral during my peak vomiting phase and we are glad to have met her.  She has been nothing but kind and helpful. Even though there were few issues during pregnancy, Vidhya mam was always there to help. She guided us well and with the information she used to provide we never lost confidence. With her support we came home with a healthy baby.

review: I strongly recommend Dr. Vidya Gayathri. I consulted from the beginning of my pregnancy. Doctor is very friendly and explained all my queries very patiently. Best part is doctor is available in call/whatsapp. I had a normal delivery. If you are looking for a safe delivery I would say please go ahead.

I definitely recommend her.

review: I have visited dr.vidhya gayatri for pregnancy checkup. She s really explaining the issues and problems very clearly..Dr is very friendly..Even we ask any chilly questions also she answers everything clearly..I recommend this dr for any gynaecology related issues and routine checkup.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were so glad to chose her as our preferred doctor during my pregnancy. Being high BP patient she treated very well and carefully. She read me and waited till 38 weeks to deliver. Regarding any query/issues if we were messaging at any time she will reply with the proper solution. Finally we blessed with baby boy with weight 3.08kg inspite of high BP. One important thing being covid-19 lockdown time she never took step back to treat patients. Always in touch with patient. She treat patients very well with minimal visits if required then only she asks us to come. She prescribes next visit scans and lab in current visit itself ** ***** *********** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I've visited Dr. Vidhya for my pregnancy. This was my first pregnancy and we had lots of questions from the beginning.She listened to our queries with concern and addressed them with proper response or medications. Doctor's friendliness and experience gave me the confidence to come back to Bangalore for delivery from my hometown . She has always been available for any emergency or doubts (Physical checkup, Video consultation, WhatsApp) .I've been blessed with a beautiful baby girl by normal delivery and all thanks to doctor Vidhya and team for helping me to begin the beautiful journey of motherhood ☺ Highly recommend doctor Vidhya.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

review: We met Dr. Vidya Gayathri during the second trimester. Doctor cleared all our doubts every time with extreme patience. She was available outside her consultation hours for emergencies or even doubt clarification. We are very happy to have consulted Dr. Vidya Gayathri.
